title: ASICS Tiger Japan S
details:
Classic, Casual, Cool
The sporting heritage-inspired ASICS Tiger Japan S low-cut shoe boasts clean, tasteful styling that makes it perfect for the working in the office, partying, or strolling the streets. With its mix of supple leather and synthetic materials, the Japan S brings plenty of comfort cred to the mix. Show off your red, white, and blue style with this timeless sneaker.

ASICS Tiger Japan S features:
•Leather and synthetic upper has a premium look and feel.
•Toe box perforations promote cooling airflow.
•Gum rubber outsole offers durability and traction.

title: ASICS Tiger Lyte Classic
details: Tackle life’s adventures in style with the ASICS Lyte Classic.  Leather and synthetic fibers form an eye-catching upper. Rubber outsole offers durability and traction.

title: ASICS Tiger GEL-Lyte III
details:
Go for a Carefree Stroll
Styled after running shoes of bygone days, the ASICS GEL-Lyte III sneaker takes casual wear very seriously. This sporty-looking shoe is designed to provide all-day comfort thanks to famous GEL cushioning technology and a supple suede and synthetic upper. It’s a classic look for you and a treat for your feet. 

ASICS GEL-Lyte III features:
•Suede and synthetic upper has a premium appearance.
•Split tongue enables easy on/off.
•TPU heel protector adds a splash of color.
•Rear-foot GEL cushion provides a springy feel.
•Lightweight, molded sponge rubber outsole supplies traction.
